price: 55. Zij zeiden: “Heb jij ons de waarheid gebracht, of behoor je tot diegenen die maar een beetje spelen?”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
